barMediaBtn.description: The Media button text as visible on the floating bar

barSettingsBtn.description: The Settings button text as visible on the floating bar

barSettingsDescription.description: Video download feature description in settings popup

barSettingsDoNotShow.description: Button in settings popup disabling video-downloader

barSettingsDoNotShowForSite.description: Button in settings popup disabling video-downloader for exact site

barSettingsTitle.description: Settings popup title in the floating bar

eulaText.description: EULA message displayed to the user
eulaText.message:
Ao aceitar o nosso
Contrato de Licença de Utilizador Final
(CLUF), reconhece e aceita que é da sua responsabilidade utilizar o Video Downloader em conformidade com as leis de direitos de autor aplicáveis e com os termos de utilização de qualquer site.

extensionName.description: Name shown in the extension button in SZB Control Center.

extensionTitle.description: Title shown on hover over the extension button in SZB Control Center.

optionUnknownSize.description: Videa or audio download option of unknown size

popupAudioHeading.description: The heading of the audio section in the media popup list

popupDisabledFor.description: Page was disabled for video downloader
popupDisabledFor.message: O Video Downloader está desativado para

popupDownloadBtn.description: The Download button text as visible in the media popup list

popupEnable.description: Enable video downloader for current page

popupNoVideos.description: Page does not contain any videos
popupNoVideos.message: Não existem vídeos para transferir nesta página

popupNoVideos_v2.message: Para transferir um vídeo, aceda à página de detalhes do mesmo.

popupVideoHeading.description: The heading of the video section in the media popup list

reattachBtn.description: The Reattach button text as visible on the detached video page
